message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by you. I understand its importance and would like to extend this opportunity to you. Considering its quality and value, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects the high value you place on the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit. I believe this offer strikes a balance between our interests. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding.
